module.name: printed_physical_layout_template
module.keywords: module, template, layout, simulation model, embedded passive, microwave, library, configuration management

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of layout templates for layered electrical design where the templates provide a specific function in the design. The templates may be predefined and stored in a library. The templates may be used to define material, geometric, and functional properties for embedded passive components. The templates may be used to define material, structural and functional properties for microwave and rf components realized as part of the interconnect substrate. The templates may be used to define a cross-section representation using boundary element structures with two dimensional geometry. The cross-section representation may be used to define commonly used transmission line types including but not limited to microstrip, stripline, offset stripline, and co-planar structures. Terminal relationships are provided to support mapping between transmission line structures and lumped representations.
The second edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the first edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been removed:
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been modified:
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been added:
In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.
This third edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the second edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been removed:
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been added:
In addition, modifications have been made to the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.

inscope.li: templates for simple and complex microwave structures;
templates for simple and complex embedded passive structures;
terminals for access to the template functionality;
surface and cross section terminal representations;
definition of the connections provided by the template where more than one template terminal has the same signal name;
mapping between the functional view terminals and the layout view template terminals;
transmission line cross section template structures;
items within the scope of application module Functional usage view, ISO/TS 10303-1705;
items within the scope of application module Layered interconnect complex template, ISO/TS 10303-1716.

definition.def: geometric patterns applied to specific material stackup structure in order to achieve a specific function at Microwave frequencies
